title: 5 minutes daily
info:
5 minutes calls to Iran, for 1  day for 35 afghans.
To activate, press the green button and to deactivate, press the red button.
To activate, send d981 to 555 and to deactivate, send d981.

title: 15 minutes daily
info:
15 minutes calls to Pakistan, for 1 day at the price  35 Afghanis.
Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate.
Send 921 to activate and send d921 to 555 to deactivate.

title: 15 minutes daily
info:
15 minutes call to India, for 1 day at the price of 35 afghani.  
Press the green button to activate and press the red button to deactivate. 
To activate 911 and to deactivate send d911 to 555.

title: 25 minutes weekly
info:
25 minutes  Calls to Iran, for 7 days at the price of 150 Afghanis.
Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate.  
To activate 987 and to deactivate send d987 to 555.

title: 75 minutes weekly
info:
75 minutes of calls to Pakistan, for 7 days at the price of 150 Afghanis.
Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate.  
To activate 927 and to deactivate send D927 to 555.

title: 75 minutes weekly
info:
75 minutes of calls to India, for 7 days at the price of 150 Afghanis.
Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate.  
Send 917 to activate and send D917 to 555 to deactivate.
